name: Walkies
description:
Audio with Chunity. Haven't been able to get a WebGL or Mac build working, so just Windows for now.

Left and right arrows to select between 3 tracks. Space to start.

QWER to step (R>E>W>Q in order for a clean walk cycle).

Space to change the harmony (only in Black and Orange track).

Ctrl+R to reload the game.

Experimental:

+ to add additional step cycles to the automatically walking wolf.

- to remove an added step cycle. 

0 to clear all additional step cycles.
